title: Katie Price larks about on pink mobility scooter as kids move out of mucky mansion
text:

Katie Price put her latest troubles behind her as she larked about on a pink mobility scooter.

For an unknown reason, the former glamour model was clad in a lizard costume - complete with giant gloved hands - for the picture.

"There’s only one Pricey," Katie boasted to her fans in the caption, as she posed with her arms outstretched and a huge grin on her face.

It appeared as though Katie, 41, was midway through a clear out as she was seen with two registration plates bearing her moniker.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: officialkatieprice/Instagram)

The Pricey has had her work cut out lately amid reports she and her kids have been forced to move out of their family home while it undergoes major work.

Thankfully, they didn't have to trudge their belongings too far, as Katie and her brood are said to be living in the 'annexe' of her Sussex pad.

The annexe is said to be the only livable part of Katie's home after her 'mucky mansion' was completely gutted by a team of builders.

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

Speaking out on her new YouTube channel, Katie admitted that her family pad was living up to its nickname as she gave a tour of the rubbish strewn grounds.

"Yes, it does look like a mucky mansion," she confessed.

But Katie said there was a good reason for the mess.

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

She told viewers of her new channel that her £2million property is undergoing renovations to make it for for paying guests.

The budding vlogger took part in a YouTube Q&A with fans and teased the idea of turning her place into a spa, b&b or wedding venue.

She told one fan they were 'very close' with the suggestion that she will soon be turning her family home into a bed and breakfast or a place for 'adult' parties.

(Image: Youtube)

"You're sort of close with what you think I'm turning my house into," she teased.

She went on: "I do want to do a beauty salon and spa. That might be something I will add eventually."

Asked if she would consider turning her place into a 'haunted mansion', Katie revealed she doesn't need to.

"Trust me, I think it already is [haunted]," she said.
description: The cash-strapped former glamour model has been forced to move out of her home
